channel.title: Cascade Tutorial on Cascade Tuts
channel.description: Recent content in Cascade Tutorial on Cascade Tuts

item.title: Templates
item.description: Templates are the most basic functional pieces. These combine static HTML with system regions to define where and how content is placed.

item.title: Configurations
item.description: Configurations are collections of outputs used to display page content. These options may include PDFs, HTML pages, or others.

item.title: Content Types
item.description: Content Types combine the look and feel to the editable fields.

item.title: Data Definition
item.description: Datadefinitions define the user editable features of an asset.

item.title: Metadata Sets
item.description: Metadata Sets define the asset metadata. These may include the name of an asset, it’s description and/or keywords.
